intent_atoms.description: Add dedicated registry entries and parsing logic for both 32-bit (stco) and 64-bit (co64) chunk offset boxes in the MP4 parser.
The ParsedBoxPayload model must carry normalized offset arrays for stco and co64 chunks.
JSON export snapshots should capture the new structured payload for stco and co64.
Use a shared ParsedBoxPayload model to store normalized offsets for both stco and co64.
The system must maintain consistent registry entries for stco and co64 parsing logic.

functional_units.name: stco/co64 Chunk Offset Parser
functional_units.description: Parses 32-bit stco and 64-bit co64 chunk offset boxes, normalizes offsets into a shared payload model

functional_units.name: ParsedBoxPayload Model
functional_units.description: Data structure that holds normalized chunk offset arrays for parsed boxes

functional_units.name: JSON Export Snapshots
functional_units.description: Exports parsed box payloads to JSON format for snapshot testing
